reyna-page-rnt-buy-some: Want to buy some reyna Tokens?
reyna-page-rnt-buy-some-desc: It's common to mix up reyna and RNT. reyna is a network on the basis of which many directions will develop, RNT is the primary asset of Reyna Network. RNT is what you're probably looking to buy.
page-rnt-collectible-tokens-desc: Tokens that represent a collectible game item, piece of digital art, or other unique assets. Commonly known as non-fungible tokens (NFTs).
reyna-page-rnt-reyna-exchange-network-de: A community deployed DApp which provides a borderless, peer-to-peer, fiat-to-crypto ‘Reyna Network' that allows Stakeholders to find nearby users to exchange their cash for digital assets and currency. RNT is required to become a seller in the network.
reyna-page-rnt-currency-for-apps: It's the currency of Reyna Network.
reyna-page-rnt-currency-for-future: RNT powers and incentivizes participation in the Reyna Network.
reyna-page-rnt-description: RNT is required to power certain application features and create an open source, decentralized economy. Dive deeper into each of the RNT Use Cases below to learn more about the cryptoeconomic research and how value flows throughout the network.
page-rnt-rnthub-overview: rntHub has a great overview if you want
reyna-page-rnt-dao-desc: A core part of the Reyna Network Token is giving stakeholders the ability to choose the direction that the software is developed. RNT is used to make decisions on proposals, which can be made by any Stakeholder. For each decision, the token is cloned into a separate decision token. The amount of tokens you hold at that time becomes your voting power for that decision and it does not cost RNT to vote.
reyna-page-rnt-fuels: RNT fuels and secures Reyna Network
reyna-page-rnt-fuels-desc: RNT is the lifeblood of Reyna Network. When you send RNT or use an Reyna Network application, you'll pay a small fee in RNT to use the Reyna Network. This fee is an incentive for a miner to process and verify what you're trying to do.
reyna-page-rnt-fuels-desc-2: Miners are like the record-keepers of Reyna Network – they check and prove that no one is cheating. Miners who do this work are also rewarded with small amounts of newly-issued RNT.
reyna-page-rnt-fuels-desc-3: The work miners do keeps Reyna Network secure and free of centralized control. In other words,
reyna-page-rnt-fuels-staking: RNT will become even more important with staking. When you stake your RNT you'll be able to help secure Reyna Network and earn rewards. In this system, the threat of losing your RNT disincentivises attacks.
page-rnt-gov-tokens-desc: Tokens that represent voting power in decentralized organisations.
page-rnt-has-value-desc: rnt's valuable in different ways to different people.
page-rnt-has-value-desc-2: For users of ethereum, rnt is valuable because it lets you pay transaction fees.
page-rnt-has-value-desc-3: Others see it as a digital store of value because the creation of new rnt slows down over time.
page-rnt-has-value-desc-4: More recently, rnt has become valuable to users of financial apps on ethereum. That's because you can use rnt as collateral for crypto loans, or as a payment system.
page-rnt-has-value-desc-5: Of course many also see it as an investment, similar to Bitcoin or other cryptocurrencies.
reyna-page-rnt-sticker-market-desc: Stickers offer a fun way for users to visually interact with their friends and family. The Sticker Market within Reyna Network will allow anyone to create and sell their own designs to users all over the world, and begin using stickers within any reyna Messenger chat.
page-rnt-not-only-crypto: rnt isn't the only crypto on ethereum
page-rnt-not-only-crypto-desc: Anyone can create new kinds of assets and trade them on ethereum. These are known as 'tokens'. People have tokenised traditional currencies, their real estate, their art, and even themselves!
page-rnt-not-only-crypto-desc-2: ethereum is home to thousands of tokens – some more useful and valuable than others. Developers are constantly building new tokens that unlock new possibilities and open new markets.
page-rnt-not-only-crypto-desc-3: If you'd like to learn more about tokens, our friends at rntHub have written a couple of great overviews:
reyna-page-rnt-tribute-to-talk-desc: Tribute to Talk will introduce an economics-based anti-spam filter – in this case for receiving messages and “cold” contact requests from users. This enables stakeholders to set a minimum amount of RNT that must be deposited in order for someone outside of their network contact him/her directly.
reyna-page-rnt-rns-name-desc: RNS addresses are like usernames. Jenny.rnt names can point to a personal account, enabling others to send tokens or find on reyna Messenger chat. RNS addresses can be searched in reyna Messenger chat, wallet and browser.
page-rnt-shit-coins-desc: Because making new tokens is easy, anyone can do it - even people with bad or misguided intentions. Always do your research before using them!
page-rnt-stablecoins-desc: Tokens that mirror the value of traditional currency like dollars. This solves the volatility problem with many cryptocurrencies.
reyna-page-rnt-underpins: RNT underpins the Reyna Network financial system
reyna-page-rnt-underpins-desc: Not satisfied with payments, the Reyna Network community is building a whole financial system that's peer-to-peer and accessible to everyone.
reyna-page-rnt-underpins-desc-2: You can use RNT as collateral to generate entirely different cryptocurrency tokens on Reyna Network. Plus you can borrow, lend and earn interest on RNT and other RNT-backed tokens.
page-rnt-uses: Uses for rnt grow every day
page-rnt-uses-desc: Because ethereum is programmable, developers can shape rnt in countless ways.
page-rnt-uses-desc-2: Back in 2015, all you could do was send rnt from one ethereum account to another. Here are just some of things you can do today.
page-rnt-uses-desc-3: pay someone or receive funds in real time.
page-rnt-uses-desc-4: you can trade rnt with other tokens including Bitcoin.
page-rnt-uses-desc-5: on rnt and other ethereum-based tokens.
page-rnt-uses-desc-6: access the world of cryptocurrencies with a steady, less-volatile value.
reyna-page-rnt-whats-rnt-hero-alt: Illustration of a group of people at an reyna (RNT) glyph in awe
reyna-page-rnt-whats-rnt-meta-desc: What you need to know to understand RNT and its place in Reyna Network.
reyna-page-rnt-whats-reyna-network-desc: If you'd like to learn more about Reyna Network, the technology behind RNT, check out our introduction.
reyna-page-rnt-whats-unique-desc: There are many cryptocurrencies and lots of other tokens on Binance Smart Chain, but there are some things that only RNT can do.
reyna-page-rnt-where-to-buy-desc: You can get RNT from an exchange or a wallet but different countries have different policies. Check to see the services that will let you buy RNT.
reyna-page-rnt-network-incentivization-d: Create a framework and incentivization structure for people to deploy and use Reyna Network nodes. RNT is used to incentivize and reward network participants to run a node in order to ensure the app continues to work if all nodes in the reyna-hosted cluster are down. This includes paying for forwarded messages and paying for offline messages.
page-rnt-more-on-tokens: More on tokens and their uses
page-rnt-tokens-stablecoins-description: More on the least volatile of ethereum tokens.
page-rnt-tokens-defi-description: The financial system for ethereum tokens.
page-rnt-tokens-nft-description: Tokens that represent ownership of items on ethereum.
page-rnt-tokens-dao-description: Internet communities often goverened by token holders.
reyna-page-rnt-whats-dapps-description: Dapps are a growing movement of applications that use Reyna Network to disrupt business models or invent new ones.
reyna-page-rnt-dapp-curation-desc: Dapps.reyna.network is a third party, community deployed dapp that provides a way for stakeholders in the network to discover DApps, as curated by other community members. It enables users to find what they are looking for via navigating by category and rating. RNT is required for curation and signaling in the directory. A deposit of RNT is required by DApp Developers who wish to attain greater attention to their DApp.
reyna-page-rnt-voting-dapp-desc: A first step towards community governance, the Reyna Network Voting DApp enables stakeholders to influence the future of the network. The Voting DApp can be used by anyone to set up a community vote with RNT. Leveraging quadratic voting, the amount of RNT in your wallet determines how many votes you can cast.
reyna-page-rnt-acquisition-engine-desc: Achieving our mission ultimately requires one thing: widespread end-user adoption. Using the Reyna Network Token, we can design mechanisms for growth that have been tried and tested in Web 2.0, whilst providing greater transparency and better alignment of incentives for participants. The reyna Acquisition Engine provides a cryptographically provable and transparent means of growing the user base.
